problem_names:
lemma weakenStatImpMonotonic:
  fixes \<Psi> :: 'b
  and   P :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   A :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   B :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<A> Q"
  and     "A \<subseteq> B"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<B> Q"

lemma weakenStatImpI:
  fixes \<Psi> :: 'b
  and   P :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   \<Psi>' :: 'b

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q'"
  and     "insertAssertion(extractFrame P) \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion(extractFrame Q') \<Psi>"
  and     "(\<Psi>, P, Q') \<in> Rel"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<Rel> Q"

lemma weakenStatImpE:
  fixes \<Psi> :: 'b
  and   P :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   \<Psi>' :: 'b

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<Rel> Q"

  obtains Q' where "\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q'" and "insertAssertion(extractFrame P) \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion(extractFrame Q') \<Psi> " and "(\<Psi>, P, Q') \<in> Rel"

lemma weakStatImpWeakenStatImp:
  fixes \<Psi>  :: 'b
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"

  assumes cSim: "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox><Rel> Q"
  and     cStatEq: "\<And>\<Psi>' R S \<Psi>''. \<lbrakk>(\<Psi>', R, S) \<in> Rel; \<Psi>' \<simeq> \<Psi>''\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> (\<Psi>'', R, S) \<in> Rel"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<Rel> Q"

lemma weakenStatImpWeakStatImp:
  fixes \<Psi>  :: 'b
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<Rel> Q"
  and     cExt: "\<And>\<Psi>' R S \<Psi>''. (\<Psi>', R, S) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> (\<Psi>' \<otimes> \<Psi>'', R, S) \<in> Rel"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox><Rel> Q"
translations:
lemma weakenStatImpMonotonic:
  fixes \<Psi> :: 'b
  and   P :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   A :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   B :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<A> Q"
  and     "A \<subseteq> B"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<B> Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<A> Q
  A \<subseteq> B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<B> Q

lemma weakenStatImpI:
  fixes \<Psi> :: 'b
  and   P :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   \<Psi>' :: 'b

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q'"
  and     "insertAssertion(extractFrame P) \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion(extractFrame Q') \<Psi>"
  and     "(\<Psi>, P, Q') \<in> Rel"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<Rel> Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q'
  insertAssertion (extractFrame P)
   \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion (extractFrame Q') \<Psi>
  (\<Psi>, P, Q') \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<Rel> Q

lemma weakenStatImpE:
  fixes \<Psi> :: 'b
  and   P :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   \<Psi>' :: 'b

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<Rel> Q"

  obtains Q' where "\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q'" and "insertAssertion(extractFrame P) \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion(extractFrame Q') \<Psi> " and "(\<Psi>, P, Q') \<in> Rel"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>Q'.
        \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q';
         insertAssertion (extractFrame P)
          \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion (extractFrame Q')
      \<Psi>;
         (\<Psi>, P, Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<Rel> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>Q'.
        \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q';
         insertAssertion (extractFrame P)
          \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion (extractFrame Q')
      \<Psi>;
         (\<Psi>, P, Q') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

lemma weakStatImpWeakenStatImp:
  fixes \<Psi>  :: 'b
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"

  assumes cSim: "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox><Rel> Q"
  and     cStatEq: "\<And>\<Psi>' R S \<Psi>''. \<lbrakk>(\<Psi>', R, S) \<in> Rel; \<Psi>' \<simeq> \<Psi>''\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> (\<Psi>'', R, S) \<in> Rel"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<Rel> Q"

obtain Q' Q'' where QChain: "\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q'"
                  and PImpQ': "insertAssertion(extractFrame P) \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion(extractFrame Q') \<Psi>"
                  and Q'Chain: "\<Psi> \<otimes> \<one> \<rhd> Q' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q''" and "(\<Psi> \<otimes> \<one>, P, Q'') \<in> Rel"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox><Rel> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>Q' Q''.
        \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q';
         insertAssertion (extractFrame P)
          \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion (extractFrame Q')
      \<Psi>;
         \<Psi> \<otimes>
         \<one> \<rhd> Q' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q'';
         (\<Psi> \<otimes> \<one>, P, Q'') \<in> Rel\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (state)
this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q'
  insertAssertion (extractFrame P)
   \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion (extractFrame Q') \<Psi>
  \<Psi> \<otimes>
  \<one> \<rhd> Q' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q''
  (\<Psi> \<otimes> \<one>, P, Q'') \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<Rel> Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<otimes>
  \<one> \<rhd> Q' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q''
  ?\<Psi> \<otimes> \<one> \<simeq> ?\<Psi>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> Q' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q''

proof (state)
this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q''

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<Rel> Q

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q'
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q''

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q'
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q''

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q''

proof (state)
this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q''

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<Rel> Q

proof (state)
this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q''

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<Rel> Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q''

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. insertAssertion (extractFrame Q')
     \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion (extractFrame Q'')
 \<Psi>

proof (state)
this:
  insertAssertion (extractFrame Q')
   \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion (extractFrame Q'')
                                     \<Psi>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<Rel> Q

proof (chain)
picking this:
  insertAssertion (extractFrame P)
   \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion (extractFrame Q') \<Psi>
  insertAssertion (extractFrame Q')
   \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion (extractFrame Q'')
                                     \<Psi>

proof (prove)
using this:
  insertAssertion (extractFrame P)
   \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion (extractFrame Q') \<Psi>
  insertAssertion (extractFrame Q')
   \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion (extractFrame Q'')
                                     \<Psi>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. insertAssertion (extractFrame P)
     \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion (extractFrame Q'')
 \<Psi>

proof (state)
this:
  insertAssertion (extractFrame P)
   \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion (extractFrame Q'')
                                     \<Psi>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<Rel> Q

proof (state)
this:
  insertAssertion (extractFrame P)
   \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion (extractFrame Q'')
                                     \<Psi>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<Rel> Q

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (\<Psi> \<otimes> \<one>, P, Q'') \<in> Rel
  ?\<Psi> \<otimes> \<one> \<simeq> ?\<Psi>

proof (prove)
using this:
  (\<Psi> \<otimes> \<one>, P, Q'') \<in> Rel
  ?\<Psi> \<otimes> \<one> \<simeq> ?\<Psi>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Psi>, P, Q'') \<in> Rel

proof (state)
this:
  (\<Psi>, P, Q'') \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<Rel> Q

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q''
  insertAssertion (extractFrame P)
   \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion (extractFrame Q'')
                                     \<Psi>
  (\<Psi>, P, Q'') \<in> Rel

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q''
  insertAssertion (extractFrame P)
   \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion (extractFrame Q'')
                                     \<Psi>
  (\<Psi>, P, Q'') \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<Rel> Q

proof (state)
this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<Rel> Q

lemma weakenStatImpWeakStatImp:
  fixes \<Psi>  :: 'b
  and   P   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   Rel :: "('b \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi \<times> ('a, 'b, 'c) psi) set"
  and   Q   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox>\<^sub>w<Rel> Q"
  and     cExt: "\<And>\<Psi>' R S \<Psi>''. (\<Psi>', R, S) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> (\<Psi>' \<otimes> \<Psi>'', R, S) \<in> Rel"

  shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<lessapprox><Rel> Q"

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<Psi>'.
       \<exists>Q' Q''.
          \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q' \<and>
          insertAssertion (extractFrame P)
           \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion
       (extractFrame Q') \<Psi> \<and>
          \<Psi> \<otimes>
          \<Psi>' \<rhd> Q' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> Q'' \<and>
          (\<Psi> \<otimes> \<Psi>', P, Q'') \<in> Rel
